18.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin 'Abdullah:That a man from his people hunted a rabbit or two and slaughtered them with Marwah. Then he hung them up until he met the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), so he asked him about that, and he (ﷺ) told him to eat them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الذَّبِيحَةِ بِالْمَرْوَةِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Slaughtering With Al-Marwah (Granite)
